name: Bubble Shooter Mania - Sweet Halloween
description:
Help free the cute creatures of Bubble Shooter Mania! The innocent creatures of Bubble Shooter Mania have been trapped by sticky candy bubbles! You must help annihilate the candy bubbles by blasting them with a cannon using themselves as ammunition!

Armed with nothing but a cannon, a basket of candy bubbles, and a fiery desire to free the villagers from oppression, you must strategically eradicate the enemy bubbles! Simply point the cannon where you want to launch your bubbles and tap the screen to fire! When the bubbles move at high speeds they will bounce off of walls, making those hard to reach, yet devastating, places possible to hit.

Game Features:
- A story driven adventure
- Stylish graphics and animations
- Creative maps with unique challenges
- Endless fun and adventure

Become the hero of Bubble Shooter Mania by disposing of the candy bubbles with your candy cannon!
